ValidationRule.description: Validates that the AssistantPhone field contains only valid phone number characters and has a minimum length
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(AssistantPhone)), OR( LEN(AssistantPhone) < 7, LEN(AssistantPhone) > 40, NOT(REGEX(AssistantPhone, "^[0-9\\s\\-\\(\\)\\+\\.]+$")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Assistant phone number must be between 7 and 40 characters and contain only digits, spaces, hyphens, parentheses, plus signs, or periods.
